definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, typically used as a given name or surname, most notably associated with Grover Cleveland, the 22nd and 24th President of the United States.
definitions.explanation_cn: 专有名词，通常用作人名或姓氏，最著名的是指美国第22任和第24任总统格罗弗·克利夫兰。
definitions.example_en: Grover Cleveland was the only U.S. president to serve two non-consecutive terms.
definitions.example_cn: 格罗弗·克利夫兰是唯一一位担任两届非连续任期的美国总统。
